DESCRIPTION: Use the command "sdaily" to claim your daily reward. Maintain a streak to get even better rewards!
NOTE:
⚠️ Discord, as well as Sofi Staff will NEVER do any of the following:
- Ask you for your "Password" or "One-Time-Passwords"
- Advise you to change your E-Mail
- Use third-party methods, such as "Mee6" or "Dyno" to communicate with you.

Any suspicious activity should be immidately reported at {{link}}! ⚠️
GUILD_BONUS:
Since you are using this command on a Top-20 Sofi Server, your `Daily` Reward is increased by x1.5!
<:silvercoin:915619222229512213> + {{silverAmount}}
